name: GeroWallet
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: Gero is an all in one solution on the Cardano blockchain. This includes Cardano native token support, non-fungible token support, staking, hardware wallet support, and in wallet DEX aggregator. The GERO token is used as a governance token as well as for transaction discounts, unlocking premium features and platform personalization.
